parts.text: {"word":"observe","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"観察する、観測する","english_definition":"to watch carefully; to pay attention to something.","examples":[{"sentence":"Scientists observe the behavior of animals in their natural habitat.","translation":"科学者たちは自然の生息地で動物の行動を観察する。"},{"sentence":"I observed that she seemed nervous.","translation":"彼女は神経質そうだと私は観察した。"},{"sentence":"The doctor observed the patient's symptoms.","translation":"医者は患者の症状を観察した。"}],"collocations":["observe a phenomenon (現象を観察する)","observe behavior (行動を観察する)","observe changes (変化を観察する)","observe carefully (注意深く観察する)"],"synonyms":["watch","monitor","scrutinize","examine","inspect"],"antonyms":["ignore","overlook","neglect"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"（法律・規則・習慣など）を守る、遵守する","english_definition":"to obey a law, rule, or custom.","examples":[{"sentence":"People should observe the traffic rules.","translation":"人々は交通ルールを守るべきだ。"},{"sentence":"The company observes strict safety regulations.","translation":"その会社は厳格な安全規則を遵守している。"},{"sentence":"We must observe the terms of the contract.","translation":"私たちは契約条件を守らなければならない。"}],"collocations":["observe the law (法律を守る)","observe rules (規則を守る)","observe customs (習慣を守る)","observe regulations (規制を遵守する)"],"synonyms":["obey","follow","comply with","adhere to","respect"],"antonyms":["disobey","violate","ignore","disregard"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"（祭り・記念日など）を祝う、記念する","english_definition":"to celebrate a holiday or special event.","examples":[{"sentence":"We observe Thanksgiving every year.","translation":"私たちは毎年感謝祭を祝う。"},{"sentence":"The anniversary of the company's founding is observed with a special ceremony.","translation":"会社の創立記念日は特別な式典で祝われる。"},{"sentence":"Many countries observe International Women's Day.","translation":"多くの国が国際女性デーを祝う。"}],"collocations":["observe a holiday (休日を祝う)","observe a festival (祭りを祝う)","observe an anniversary (記念日を祝う)","observe a tradition (伝統を祝う)"],"synonyms":["celebrate","commemorate","mark","recognize","honor"],"antonyms":["ignore","disregard","neglect"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"（発言・意見など）を述べる、言う","english_definition":"to say or write something, especially as a comment or remark.","examples":[{"sentence":"He observed that the weather was getting colder.","translation":"彼は天候が寒くなっていると述べた。"},{"sentence":"She observed, "This is a very interesting point."","translation":"彼女は「これは非常に興味深い点です」と述べた。"},{"sentence":"As he observed, the problem is more complex than it seems.","translation":"彼が述べたように、問題は見た目よりも複雑だ。"}],"collocations":["observe that (～と述べる)","observe briefly (手短に述べる)","observe generally (一般的に述べる)"],"synonyms":["remark","comment","mention","state","note"],"antonyms":["be silent","ignore","deny"]}],"etymology":{"value":"ラテン語の\"observare\"（見守る、注意する、遵守する）から派生。\"ob-\"（～に向かって）と\"servare\"（守る、保つ）が組み合わさった言葉。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/əbˈzɜːrv/","syllables":"ob-serve"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["observe","observes"],"past_simple":"observed","past_participle":"observed","present_participle":"observing"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**observe**」は、注意深く何かを見る、規則や法律を守る、祝う、意見を述べるなど、複数の意味を持つ動詞です。文脈によって意味が大きく変わるので注意が必要です。特に「観察する」という意味では、科学的な文脈や、注意深く状況を把握する際に使われます。「遵守する」という意味では、法律や規則、契約などを守ることを指します。「祝う」という意味では、特定のイベントや記念日を祝うことを意味します。「述べる」という意味では、意見や感想を述べる際に使われます。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ I observed to him that he was wrong.","correct":"✓ I observed to him that he was wrong. / ✓ I told him that he was wrong.","note":"「observe」を使って人に何かを伝える場合、「observe to someone that...」という形も可能ですが、「tell」を使う方がより一般的です。"},{"incorrect":"✗ You must observe with the rules.","correct":"✓ You must observe the rules.","note":"「observe」は規則や法律を「守る」という意味で使う場合、前置詞は不要です。直接目的語を取ります。"},{"incorrect":"✗ I'm observing the Christmas.","correct":"✓ I'm observing Christmas.","note":"祝う対象を直接目的語として取ります。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["observation (名詞: 観察、観測)","observant (形容詞: 注意深い、観察眼のある)","observer (名詞: 観察者、オブザーバー)","observatory (名詞: 観測所)"],"idioms_phrases":["observe silence (沈黙を守る)"],"priority":"★★★"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B1","frequency_google_ngram":"高頻度 (High frequency)","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"「**observe**」は、いくつかの意味を持つ動詞です。一番よくあるのは、何かを注意深く「見る」という意味です。例えば、動物の行動を「observe（観察する）」など。また、ルールや法律を「observe（守る）」、お祭りや記念日を「observe（祝う）」という意味もあります。さらに、意見や考えを「observe（述べる）」という意味もあります。文脈によって意味が変わるので、注意して読みましょう。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"We **observe** the stars through a telescope.","translation":"私たちは望遠鏡で星を観察する。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"観察する"},{"sentence":"It is important to **observe** safety regulations in the workplace.","translation":"職場では安全規則を守ることが重要だ。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"遵守する"},{"sentence":"The family **observes** Passover every year.","translation":"その家族は毎年過ぎ越の祭りを祝う。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"祝う"},{"sentence":"She **observed** that the meeting was running late.","translation":"彼女は会議が遅れていると述べた。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"述べる"}]}
